snippet: The officer, Eder Loor, spoke slowly as he thanked the doctors who saved his life, and he left the hospital on his daughter’s birthday to a hero’s ovation from colleagues.
abstract: New York City Police Officer Eder Loor is released from Mount Sinai Hospital just 15 days after being stabbed through the brain on an East Harlem street; Terrence Hale has been charged with attempted murder in the incident.
lead_paragraph: The officer, Eder Loor, spoke slowly as he thanked the doctors who saved his life, and he left the hospital on his daughter’s birthday to a hero’s ovation from colleagues.

headline.seo: Eder Loor, Officer Stabbed in Head, Leaves Hospital
headline.main: Officer Stabbed in Brain Exits Hospital to Cheers
headline.print_headline: Head Stabbed 2 Weeks Ago, City Officer Exits Hospital
